title: Haven't played in forever, had to reset my password, account is now banned?
body: Not sure if I was hacked, or if I just happened to do something that got me in trouble before I quit? No info in my email regaurding the ban either?

replies.body: No worries! I've pulled up your account and it looks like this was merely a protective suspension since we noticed some signs that your account might have been hacked. Reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and pick "I need help recovering my account" and you'll be back on the Rift in no time!
